title: 13th
reason: This is an excellent documentary on Netflix that outlines the racism towards Black people in America.

title: Explained: The Racial Wage Gap
reason: This short episode of Explained on Netflix does an excellent job explaining the racial wage gap in America.

title: Who Killed Malcolm X?
reason: This documentary series on Netflix covers the historical events around the murder of Malcolm X.

title: When They See Us
reason: This 4 part series on Netflix is the story of the Central Park 5.

title: Talks to help you understand racism in America
reason: This a good list of TED Talks that help educate about the racism in America.

title: Stamped from the Beginning - The Definitive History of Racist Ideas in America
reason: This is a FREE audio book that does a great job going in depth about the historical racism in America.

title: So You Want to Talk about Race
reason: This book shares the truths about the realities of racism, power and oppression.

title: The Colors of Us
reason: This book is a positive message that celebrates the differences and similarities that connect all people.

title: Waking Up White
reason: This book explores race with the desire to understand the racial divide.

title: 1619 (NYTimes)
reason: This is a podcast series on how slavery has transformed America, connecting past and present through the oldest form of storytelling.

title: Code Switch
reason: This is a great podcast talking about various topics and conversations about race.

title: Pod Save the People
reason: This podcast offers a unique take on the news, with a special focus on overlooked stories and topics that often impact people of color.

title: Our National Conversation About Race
reason: This podcast is a lively multiracial, interracial conversation about the ways we can’t talk, don’t talk, would rather not talk about race.

title: The Death of George Floyd, In Context
reason: This New Yorker article outlines the details around the incidents that sparked the Black Lives Matter movement in America after the death of George Floyd.

title: How to Make This Moment the Turning Point for Real Change
reason: This blog post by Barack Obama talks about how change can happen.

title: For Our White Friends Desiring to Be Allies
reason: This is a great article helping to educate people on how they can be strong allies.
